author: cbs8
title: Free Page Turning Software Flip PDF Enables Anyone to Create Interactive eBooks
text:
Flip PDF converts PDF to page flipping eBooks for you to distribute online and offline.
Hong Kong, China -- ( ReleaseWire ) -- 09/24/2015 -- Recently, FlipBuilder promotes Flip PDF as the free page turning software that enables anyone to create interactive eBooks. Flip PDF is a new digital publishing method that quickly creates beautiful multi-media flipbooks guaranteed to engage the reader more deeply.
"Flip PDF software is ideal for anyone wanting to make an interactive eBooks, distribute high quality online magazines, publish professional brochures or reports, create eye-catching marketing collateral, or present any other type of multi-page document," says Fermi Huang, Chief Engineer at FlipBuilder. "With Flip PDF the powerful, yet easy to use software, anyone can quickly create a beautiful interactive eBook."
This page turning software makes it easy to create a professional and attractive eBook, offering hundreds of pre-designed templates, themes, scenes and backgrounds. A wide variety of interactive elements can be incorporated to improve the reading experience and extend the engagement of readers. Videos, audio, music and links can all be embedded into any eBook.
Finished Flip PDF eBooks can be distributed and shared both online and offline. They can be shared on social media sites and published on websites or blogs. Online Flip PDF eBooks provide a smooth mobile experience, supporting any mobile device including cell phones, iPads and tablets.
To learn more about FlipBuilder's revolutionary and innovative eBook software, and how to quickly create an interactive eBook, visit http://www.flipbuilder.com/make-an-ebook-interactive.html .
About FlipBuilder
FlipBuilder provides an innovative and professional digital publishing solution to convert static PDF files into wonderful, interactive online flipbooks. From design to delivery, it provides users the best experience.
